title: SQL Query Builder
description: Build a simple SQL SELECT query builder using pure Kotlin string operations to understand query construction.
instructions: Create a QueryBuilder class with select(), from(), and where() methods that chain to build a SQL string. Print the final query.

testCases.expectedOutput: SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE age > 18

hints.text: Store parts of the query as properties
Each method should return 'this' for chaining
A build() method assembles the final string

commonMistakes.mistake: Forgetting to return this for chaining
commonMistakes.correction: Return this from each builder method
Use joinToString for clean comma separation

commonMistakes.mistake: Not handling the WHERE clause as optional
commonMistakes.correction: Only append WHERE if a condition was set
